Title: No Friends on the Street
Writer: Courtney Kemp Agboh (created by), Gary Lennon, Vladimir Cvetko (story editor), Safia Dirie (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: Tommy offers to help Ghost with his drug business on the condition that he uses Angela as an information source. Ghost is surprised when Kanan is released from jail.
